import React, { useState, useEffect, Component } from "react"; import "../AccountsAsset/dash.css"; import { Route, Switch, useHistory, Redirect, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import TradingViewWidget, { Themes } from "react-tradingview-widget"; class Orders extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.props = { real: [], default: [], }; } savedOrders = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("orders")) ?
